definition: lit. to bite the teeth tightly (idiom); fig. to grit one's teeth and bear the pain/to bite the bullet
tight/strict/close at hand/near/urgent/tense/hard up/short of money/to tighten
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve

sentences.english: You have to bite the bullet.
sentences.chinese: 他說，“你一定要咬緊牙關堅持住。

sentences.english: It's not easy to bear up under such circumstances.
sentences.chinese: 在這樣的環境下咬緊牙關堅持是不容易的。

sentences.english: The snow was blowing in his face, but the gritted his teeth and went on.
sentences.chinese: 大雪撲面，但是他咬緊牙關，繼續前進。

sentences.english: This can be a teeth-grittingly painful procedure.
sentences.chinese: 這可以說是個需要咬緊牙關的痛苦過程。

sentences.english: It takes gritting your teeth. It takes discipline.
sentences.chinese: 你得咬緊牙關，你得有嚴格的紀律。

sentences.english: The snow was blowing in her face, but Ann gritted her teeth and went on.
sentences.chinese: 風雪打在她臉上，但安咬緊牙關繼續向前走。

sentences.english: Hanks so scrupulously, heroically mimes the wasting wought by the disease.
sentences.chinese: 漢克斯咬緊牙關，一絲不苟地模仿艾滋病造成的虛弱。

sentences.english: He clammed up when I asked him who else was involved.
sentences.chinese: 當我問他還有誰參與此事時，他咬緊牙關，不肯交代。

sentences.english: In spite of all kinds of torture, Sister Jiang gritted her teeth without saying a word.
sentences.chinese: 儘管受盡各種刑罰，江姐咬緊牙關不開口。

sentences.english: I groaned, set my teeth and reached forward again.
sentences.chinese: 我呻吟着咬緊牙關進行又一次前進的嘗試。

sentences.english: She stood before him, at the end of her speech, with her teeth clenched, her cheeks flaming.
sentences.chinese: 她講完話，站在他面前，咬緊牙關，雙頰通紅。

sentences.english: Does directs this line, means that clenches the teeth and is duty-bound not to turn back.
sentences.chinese: 幹上導演這一行，就意味着咬緊牙關和義無反顧。

sentences.english: It's very hot this summer, we have to bite down.
sentences.chinese: 今年夏天很熱，我們只好咬緊牙關熬過去。

sentences.english: I gritted my teeth as I thought what a despicable thing it would be.
sentences.chinese: 想到這將是件非常可鄙的事，我就不禁咬緊牙關。

sentences.english: She clenched her teeth and refused to move.
sentences.chinese: 她咬緊牙關不肯挪動一步。

sentences.english: Gritting his teeth, Marcus gestured as light flashed over him, restoring his strength.
sentences.chinese: 咬緊牙關，馬庫斯讓聖光閃現，恢復了他的力量。

definition: to submit to humiliation (idiom); to suffer in silence/to swallow one's anger/to grin and bear it
spirit weary, strength exhausted (idiom); spent/drained/washed out
to remain calm in the face of events (idiom)
to burst into tears/to sob loudly/to bawl
